title: CVE20188373
extract: Workstation Patches. Browser and Scripting Engine patches should be prioritized for workstation-type devices, meaning any system that is used for email or to access the internet via a browser.Aug 14, 2018
extract_html: Workstation Patches. Browser and Scripting Engine patches should be prioritized for workstation-type devices, meaning any system that is used for email or to access the internet via a browser.Aug 14, 2018
